data.title: Android Developer
data.subtitle: July 2013 - Present | Remote
data.description:
Developer, Programmer, UI/UX Designer and Publisher.
Attended Google Play App Excellence Summit 2017.
Published over 20 apps on Google Play with more than 1M downloads.
Creating various open-source libraries for Android to provide better customization options and speed up the development process.

data.title: Web Developer
data.subtitle: June 2015 - Present | Remote
data.description:
Managing my personal websites using Polymer and Firebase.
Worked on some websites using MySQL and PHP for the backend (Database) and CSS/HTML and JavaScript for the frontend (user interface with the ability to perform dynamic operations).

data.title: Head - Software Development | 4GM Hyve Mobility
data.subtitle: October 2016 - 2017 | New Delhi, India
data.description:
Attended Google OEM Summit 2016.
Led the software development of 3 Android devices with different specs and features.
Designed Pure Android experience with GMS approved apps and regular security patch updates.
Visited and collaborated with ODM’s software team in China to provide the best user experience.

data.title: Senior Android Developer | 4GM Hyve Mobility
data.subtitle: December 2015 - September 2016 | New Delhi, India
data.description:
Implemented customized calling feature by using the fingerprint sensor.
Developed default home screen clock widget according to the company's hexagonal logo.
Developed user facing care app to provide useful support links within the device and to register the warranty information.

data.title: Senior Android Developer | Flyrobe
data.subtitle: September 2015 - December 2015 | Mumbai, India
data.description:
Worked on UI/UX improvements by adapting Material Design by Google.
Collaborated with the backend team and integrated the APIs given by them.
Added new features/improvements to the app as per requirements and from the user feedback.

data.title: Trainee | HCL Infosystems Ltd.
data.subtitle: June 2013 - July 2013 | Ghaziabad, U.P., India
data.description: ASP.Net and C# with an A+ grade.

data.title: Recognized Developer | XDA-Developers
data.subtitle: March 2013 - Present | Remote
data.description:
First to port Google Pixel live wallpapers to other devices.
ROM Developer (ArcMini & xNXT), ported lots of applications to older versions of Android using various concepts (smali) and hacks of reverse engineering.
First to port Sony Small Apps API to Xperia™ 2011 MDPI devices.

data.title: Recognized Themer | XDA-Developers
data.subtitle: August 2012 - September 2018 | Remote
data.description:
Designed colorful themes for CyanogenMod and also for my own ROMs (Arcmini & xNXT).
Fixed various layout issues with Xperia™ apps on small-screen devices (MDPI).

data.title: Dev Library Author | Google
data.subtitle: December 2021 - Present | Remote
data.description: Developing open-source libraries to make Android development better.
